data.title: Chatham Music and Arts Day Camp
data.meta_site_name: Chatham Music and Arts Day Camp
data.text:
Online registration for the 2024 Music and Arts Day Camp is closed. If you want to register a camper after online registration has closed, please email SummerCamps@chatham.edu to see if space is available or to join the waitlist.

Since 1956, Chatham University has strived to provide a fun and engaging summer day camp emphasizing music and the arts. There is something for everyone at Chatham Music and Arts Day Camp (CMADC). While we focus on music and arts, we also provide a variety of activities, including sports, technology, swimming, and languages.

CMADC provides a six- or three-week experience for campers ages rising 1st grade through rising 9th grade. With various activities offered, such as musical theater, mixed media, School of Rock, and more, there is something for every camper to enjoy.

The camp is divided into Divisions based on the age of the campers:

Division 1: Rising First and Second grades

Division 2: Rising Third and Fourth grades;

Division 3: Rising Fifth through Ninth grades.

The summer 2024 Music & Arts Day Camp dates are:

Six-Week Camp: June 17-July 26 (28 Days)

Session A: June 17-July 3 (13 Days)

Session B: July 8-July 26 (15 Days)

Camper drop-off is between 8:30 and 9:00 a.m., and pickup is from 3:30 to 4:00 p.m. Extended afternoon care is available from 4:00-6:00 p.m.
